triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper investigates how AI, specifically algorithmic response suggestions, impacts communication and social relationships.

triples.name: Communication
triples.relevance: The paper studies how AI affects human communication patterns and interpersonal interactions.

triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: Algorithmic response suggestions are a type of recommender system that the paper examines experimentally.

triples.name: Randomized controlled trial
triples.relevance: The paper employs two randomized experiments as its core empirical methodology to establish causal effects.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Natural language processing enables the algorithmic response suggestions that are the focus of the study.

triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes that AI increases the use of positive emotional language and studies sentiment changes in communication.

triples.name: Interpersonal relationship
triples.relevance: The paper proposes novel findings about how AI affects interpersonal relationships, including perceived closeness and cooperation.

triples.name: Humanâ€“computer interaction
triples.relevance: The paper studies human-computer interaction in the context of using algorithmic response suggestions in messaging.
